content:
To determine the fastest three horses out of 25, the guy can follow these steps:

1. Divide the 25 horses into five groups of five horses each.
2. Race the horses within each group, which will give us the fastest horse in each group.
3. Race the five fastest horses from the previous races against each other. The top three horses from this race will be the three fastest horses overall.

Therefore, the guy needs to conduct 7 races in total: 5 races for each group of horses, and 2 additional races to determine the fastest horses out of the winners of each group race.
